structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Revocation Of Order Of Suspension; Granting Of New Licenses; Hearing
law.text: The board may, upon application and after hearing, revoke an order of suspension or grant a new license to any person whose license has been revoked or suspended under the provisions of section seventy-three H, if the board is satisfied that this can be done consistently with the public interest.
